Package index

The palette class

Creating and manipulating palettes

palette() validate_palette() is_palette() as_palette()
Create a palette
vec_ptype2(<palette>)
Palette Coercion
darken() lighten()
Control palette brightness
saturate() desaturate()
Control palette saturation

Work with palette websites

Functions for viewing and decoding palettes from URLs

palette_browse() palette_browse_url()
Browse a palette on coolors.co
palette_decode_url()
Convert a URL to a palette

Helpers

Additional tools and example data

Build a palette function
